name: SoundCloud - Dark, But Not Too Dark
description:
I wanted to make a theme that would of been easy on the eyes while sticking close to home.


I do believe i have achieved that. I made it within chrome and that is what I'd recommend using for this theme.


If I forgot about something please let me know. :D I hope you enjoy this theme as much as I do and I recommend using CriAzuDre's CUSTOMIZABLE WAVEFORM HUE https://userstyles.org/styles/123974/customizable-waveform-hue
